result: Question 155) A person was interested in purchasing a product advertised in a store. Negotiated with the manager and managed to buy it at a compound interest rate of 1% per month. The first payment will be a month after the purchase of the product, and in the amount of R $ 202.00. The second payment will be made a month after the first, and will have the amount of R $ 204.02. To achieve the purchase, the manager will issue an invoice with the value of the product in cash negotiated with the customer, corresponding to the approved financing.
